name: Broken Existence
description:
This game is made for Wowie Game Jam 2.0 with the topic "INTENTIONAL BUGS"

In this game you are controlling a little box trying to find a way to the Flag. But the platform is weird. You won't know if the platform really exist or not until you find out what's going on.
Every time you hit a spike, some platforms will either be shown or hidden including the spikes.
You can do multiple jump somehow, and jump while in the air for a short time. This is unintended at the first time, so I made some level must utilize this method.

Control:

  • Left/Right Arrow to Move.
  • Up Arrow to Jump
  • ESC to Exit the Game

Code, art, audio, etc by RZFury.
Font used In-Game: Pixeled by OmegaPC777

I hope you enjoy ^^
